title: Brady (BRC) Shares Cross Below 200 DMA - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Tuesday, shares of Brady Corp (Symbol: BRC) crossed below their 200 day moving average of $46.75, changing hands as low as $46.45 per share. Brady Corp shares are currently trading down about 1.4% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of BRC shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
